text:
“

Lerilterd

MEMORANDUM

duly 16, 1987

TO: J. R. Mueller
FROM: J. R. Schnepf
SUBJECT: HARLEY-DAVIDSON POS - PLAYING CARD PROMOTION

Attached is a list of POS material which will be made available
for the Harley-Davidson Playing Card Promotion scheduled for the
Nov/Dec period,

Peterson

A. Lawless
Kennedy
Rapisarldi

Q. Tatulli
Lundberg
Discenza
Rehak
Feaster
Rolleri (NCM)

cc:

SPyEmeypr>

$L60zze6

“ Lerilterd memoranda duly 16, 1987 TO: J. R. Mueller FROM: J. R. Schnepf issue: HARLEY - DAVIDSON POS - PLAYING CARD PROMOTION Attached is a list of po material which will be made available for the Harley - Davidson Playing Card Promotion scheduled for the Nov / Dec menstruation, Peterson A. summary: The Harley-Davidson Playing Card Promotion is scheduled for the Nov/Dec period of 1987. The card is designed to be used in a variety of card games, including poker, billiards, and slots. It is intended to raise money for charity and is not intended as a commercial product.
